# CI/CD Status Badges

Add these badges to your README.md to show the status of your pipelines:

## Installation

```markdown
## Build Status

![CI Pipeline](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/extention/workflows/CI%20Pipeline/badge.svg)
![Deploy](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/extention/workflows/Deploy/badge.svg)
![CodeQL](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/extention/workflows/CodeQL%20Security%20Analysis/badge.svg)

[![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/YOUR_USERNAME/extention/branch/main/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/YOUR_USERNAME/extention)
```

## How to Use

1. Replace `YOUR_USERNAME` with your GitHub username
2. Replace `extention` with your repository name if different
3. Add to the top of your README.md file

## Example Result

This will show green checkmarks when all checks pass and red X when something fails, giving instant visibility into project health.
